original_text: I will set my face against them. Although they have come out of the fire, the fire will yet consume them. And when I set my face against them, you will know that I am the Lord.
korean_text: 내가 그들을 대적한즉 그들이 그 불에서 나와도 불이 그들을 사르리니 내가 그들을 대적할 때에 내가 여호와인 줄 너희가 알리라

sentences.original_text: I will set my face against them.
Although they have come out of the fire,
the fire will yet consume them.
And when I set my face against them,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 내 얼굴을 그들에게 대할 때,

sentences.original_text: you will know that I am the Lord.
